response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am more than willing to consider offers. Given its significance and the benefits it could bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $800,000. This offer is designed to reflect the substantial investment required to create such a product while also acknowledging its value to you. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between our interests. Should you find this proposal acceptable, I look forward to discussing the details further. If not, I have another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase the product for its full value of $1,500,000. Thank you for considering this offer.", "product_price": 800000}
